document_data.name: Pardus
document_data.mainbody: '''Pardus''' was a regular of [[the Rising Moon (inn)|the Rising Moon]] in the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: He liked the way [[Korvan]] cooked his vegetables, and wasn't above going behind his wife to eat as he pleased.
document_data.Activities: He was strongly implied to be a [[saddle]] maker.
document_data.History: One night during [[Shandril]]'s initial absence in the {{YearlinkName|1357}}, Pardus praised Korvan's cooking in a way that offended his wife, Yantra. Though many in the inn were rooting for a fight, she simply called for a half-ration of [[boar]] to her husband, rather than what he preferred. [[Gorstag]], winking, called him to the back under what he believed to be false pretenses, with the likely outcome of getting a full ration of [[deer]].
